CustomField.description: The bitly link that we provide to entrepreneurs to signup for RESILI. Uses the aeo_state field in this formula and then turn into a bitly link using Pardot redirect. Redirects to here: https://resili.aeoworks.org/business-health-assessment/?aeo_state=btoa(aeo_state)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the bitly link from the Pardot redirect here.
CustomField.label: Bitly Link To Resili
